name: Dream of the Magician
effect: Increases DMG dealt by 8%. When casting skills, for each additional hit on 1 enemy, the DMG dealt increases by 4%, up to 12%.
lastSlotEffect: Changes the effect of [Tarot Whisper Skill] into: Increases DMG dealt by 16%. When casting skills, for each additional hit on 1 enemy, the DMG dealt increases by 8%, up to 24%.

name: The Fool’s Naivety
effect: HP is increased by 10%. When initiating an active attack, if the character’s max HP is greater than the target’s, DMG dealt is increased by 10%.
lastSlotEffect: HP is additionally increased by 10%. When initiating an active attack, if the character's HP percentage is greater than the target's, DMG delat is increased by 10%

name: Mercy of the High Priestess
effect: Increases healing effect by 15%.
lastSlotEffect: Increases healing effect by 15% additionally. If the target is [Dying], the healing effect further increases by 15%

name: Elegance of the Empress
effect: After casting a skill on an ally, convert 1 [debuff] on the target into a [Level 1 Buff] that lasts for 2 turns.
lastSlotEffect: After casting a skill on an ally, additionally convert 1 [debuff] on the target into a [Level 1 Buff] that lasts for 2 turns.

name: Majesty of the Emperor
effect: DMG increases by 10% when attacking [Healthy] enemies.
lastSlotEffect: DMG dealt increases by 15% additionally when attacking [Healthy] enemies.

name: Hierophant’s Laws
effect: [AoE DMG] taken is decreased by 20%.
lastSlotEffect: When initiating a single-target attack, DMG dealt is increased by 20%. WHen initiating a single-target healing, the healing amount is increased by 20%.

name: March of the Chariot
effect: Gains [Move I] when not using any active skills and [Standby], lasting for 2 turns.
lastSlotEffect: Changes the effect of [Tarot Whisper Skill] into: Gains [Move II] when not using any active skills and [Standby], lasting for 2 turns.

name: Source of Strength
effect: When attacked by a character of [the character’s Counter Role], DMG taken is decreased by 10%. When attacking a character of [the character’s Counter Role], ignores 15% of the target’s DEF.
lastSlotEffect: When attacked by a character of [the character’s Counter Role], DMG taken is additionally decreased by 10%. When attacking a character of [the character’s Counter Role], additionally ignores 20% of the target’s DEF.

name: Silence of the Hermit
effect: Decreases DMG taken by 10%.
lastSlotEffect: Decreases DMG taken by 10% additionally.

name: Course of Fortune
effect: At the start of the turn, gains 1 random [buff] of [The Wheel of Fortune].
lastSlotEffect: At the start of the turn, gains 1 additional random [buff] of [The Wheel of Fortune].

name: Verdict of Justice
effect: Increases Crit by 15%.
lastSlotEffect: Increase Crit DMG by 15%

name: Desire for Temperance
effect: At the start of the battle, gains a [physical shield] equal to 25% of the character’s P.ATK plus its M.ATK. The shield cannot be dispelled.
lastSlotEffect: Decrease DMG taken by 15% when the character has a [shield]

name: Temptation of the Devil
effect: For each 1 character defeated in battle, gains 1 stack of [Devil]. The effect lasts until the end of the battle and cannot be dispelled or immunized.
lastSlotEffect: Changes the effect of [Tarot Whisper Skill] into: For each 1 character defeated in battle, gains 2 stack of [Devil]. The effect lasts until the end of the battle and cannot be dispelled or immunized.

name: Destruction of the Tower
effect: When it’s not the character’s turn, DMG dealt increases by 20%.
lastSlotEffect: While it's not the character's turn, gains 40% [Life Steal] when dealing DMG.

name: Gibbous Moon
effect: At the end of the turn, recovers 20% HP if the character is [Injured].
lastSlotEffect: When the character is injured, healing received increases by 15%, and further increases to 30% when in Dying state.

name: Rays of the Sun
effect: When attacking [Injured] enemies, ignore 20% of their DEF.
lastSlotEffect: When attacking [Injured] enemies, additionally ignore 20% of their DEF.

name: Redemption of the Judgment
effect: At the end of the turn, dispels 2 [Attribute Buffs] from 1 random enemy within 2 tiles around the character.
lastSlotEffect: Changes the effect of [Tarot Whisper Skill] into: At the end of the turn, dispels 2 [Attribute Buffs] from 1 random enemy within 2 tiles around the character. Inflicts [Judgment] for 2 turns.

name: Guidance of the World
effect: Recovers 1 NRG additionally when not using any active skills and [Standby].
lastSlotEffect: Reduce the CD of all active skills by 1 turn when not using any active skills and [Standby]

name: The Lovers' Intimacy
effect: Reduce [Piercing Damage] by 8%. At the start of the turn, dispel 1 [Continous Damage] from yourself.
lastSlotEffect: Reduce [Piercing Damage] by an additional 8%. At the start of the turn, dispel an additional [Continous Damage] from yourself.

name: Whispers of Death
effect: [Piercing Damage] increase by 8%.
lastSlotEffect: [Piercing Damage] increase by an additional 5%. When attacking enemies in [Dying] state, [Piercing Damage increased by an additional 5%.

name: Guidance of the Star
effect: Increase [Shield Value] by 8%
lastSlotEffect: Increases [Shield Value] by an additional 8%. Increases [Shield Value] gained by 8%

name: The Hanged Man's Devotion
effect: [Continuous Damage] increased by 8%.
lastSlotEffect: [Continuous Damage] is increased by an additional 6%; when attacking an enemy in the [Healthy] state, [Continuous Damage] is increased by an additional 6%.
